lore.worse_elytra.normal: They look to be in perfect condition, you feel as if you could fly forever.
lore.worse_elytra.ruffled: After hours of turbulent flight, these elytra have become ruffled and less effective.
lore.worse_elytra.withered: Sickly and damaged, these elytra struggle to keep you aloft.
lore.worse_elytra.broken: The broken spirit of these elytra yearn for flight, but they can no longer support it.
